infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Coaster needs access to your location while you are using it to track the songs you play at each location.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Coaster needs access to your location at all times to continuously track the songs you play, even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Coaster needs access to your location at all times to track the songs you play at each location, ensuring accurate logging even when the app is not in the foreground.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Coaster to use your location.
